sentences.text: NOTICE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING AND 2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the shareholders of Exelon Corporation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual meeting of shareholders will be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017 at 9:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time at 1310 Point Street, 10  Floor, Baltimore, Maryland to: th
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1) Elect director nominees named in the proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2) Ratify PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as Exelons independent auditor for 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3) Approve the compensation of our named executive officers as disclosed in the proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4) Advise on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5) Conduct any other business that properly comes before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of record as of March 3, 2017 are entitled to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 15, 2017, we will mail to our shareholders a Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials, which will indicate how to access our proxy materials on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By furnishing the Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials we are lowering the costs and reducing the environmental impact of our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bruce G. Wilson Senior Vice President, Deputy General Counsel and Corporate Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to vote promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet and telephone voting are available through 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on April 24, 2017.

sentences.text: We are providing these proxy materials in connection with the solicitation by the board of directors of Exelon Corporation (Exelon, the company, we, us, or our), a Pennsylvania corporation, of proxies to be voted at our 2017 annual meeting of shareholders and at any adjournment or postponement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual meeting of shareholders will take place on April 25, 2017 at 9:00 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time at 1310 Point Street, 10  Floor, Baltimore, Maryland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: th
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MATTERS FOR SHAREHOLDER VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this years annual meeting, we are asking our shareholders to vote on the following matters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors recommends a vote FOR the election of the director nominees named in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See pages 1-18 for further information on the nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2: Appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as independent auditor for 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors recommends a vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See page 41 for details.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3: Advisory Approval of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors recommends a vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See page 42-86 for details.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 4: Advisory Vote on Frequency of an Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors recommends a vote FOR the option of ONE YEAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See page 87 for details.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors knows of no other matters to be presented for action at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any matter is presented from the floor of the annual meeting, the individuals serving as proxies intend to vote on these matters in the best interest of all shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your signed proxy card gives this authority to Thomas S. ONeill and Bruce G. Wilson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please refer to the material on pages 90-93 for information about how to cast your votes, who may attend the meeting, and other frequently asked questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GOVERNANCE HIGHLIGHTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon is committed to maintaining the highest standards of corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strong corporate governance practices help us achieve our performance goals and maintain the trust and confidence of our investors, employees, customers, regulatory agencies and other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance practices are described in more detail on pages 19-33 and in our Corporate Governance Principles which are available on the Exelon website at www.exeloncorp.com on the Governance page under the Investors tab.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In uncontested elections, directors must be elected by a majority of votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligible shareholders may nominate directors through Exelons proxy access bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board annually reviews its effectiveness as a group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continuing director education is provided during regular board and committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors regularly meet in executive sessions without management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may not stand for election after age 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Political activities and contributions are disclosed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: iv  Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our board reviews Exelons systematic approach to identifying and assessing risks faced by Exelon and our business units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board considers enterprise risk in connection with emerging trends or developments and the evaluation of capital investments and business opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The boards finance and risk committee oversees our risk management strategy, policies and practices and financial condition and risk exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors must hold at least 15,000 shares of Exelon common stock within five years after joining the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO must, after five years of employment, hold Exelon Common Stock valued at six times base salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive vice presidents and higher officers must, within five years after employment or September 30, 2012, hold Exelon Common Stock, valued at three times base salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors and executives are not permitted to hedge or pledge Exelon stock or engage in short sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION HIGHLIGHTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We took considerable actions this year on our executive compensation program in response to the failed 2016 say-on-pay vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These actions were in direct response to shareholder feedback received in meetings and calls conducted by the chair of the compensation committee and management beginning in June 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strong Company Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beat adjusted (non-GAAP) operating EPS target for the Annual incentive program by 14 cents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted (non-GAAP) operating EPS growth in 2016 ($2.68) vs 2015 ($2.49) was 8%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXC one-year total shareholder return (TSR) (32.8%) outperformed the UTY by 15.4 percentage points and the S&P 500 by 20.9 percentage points
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grew company enterprise value by $14.4 billion through M&A including PHI, ConEd Solutions, and the James A. FitzPatrick Nuclear Power Plant (pending)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NY and IL clean energy regulations and legislation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, through growth and acquisition achieved Fortune 100 status (only utility company)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All time best nuclear operating performance; best in class
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Best on record or best in class utility operating performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rapid Response to Failed 2016 Say-on-Pay Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reached out to shareholders holding approximately 50% of our shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Immediately addressed the major shareholder concerns by modifying the Annual and Long-Term incentive programs   Changes included:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moved performance share (PShares) goal measurement period from annual to 3-year
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Changed PShare goals to align better with Exelons value proposition and strategic initiatives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Removed individual performance multipliers from all incentive programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strengthened the TSR modifier
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Capped incentive payouts if one-year absolute TSR is negative
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moved operational metrics to Annual incentive program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Removed all legacy change in control tax gross-ups
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO Pay for Performance Alignment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board reduced the 2016 Annual incentive program payout from 143% to 100%, in part, to address shareholder concerns that the previous years AIP payout was too high relative to TSR performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board froze 2017 target pay at 2016 levels
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee regularly assesses the size of the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee believes that the current size of the board is appropriate for Exelon, considering the size and geographic scope of the company and our need to access a wide range of views and backgrounds to reflect the diversity and complexity of our business and the markets we serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are 13 nominees for director at the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors held eight meetings during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board also attended a two-day strategy retreat with the senior officers of Exelon and subsidiary companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors attended at least 82% of all board and committee meetings that they were eligible to attend, with an average attendance of approximately 96.84% across all directors for all board and committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although Exelon does not have a formal policy requiring attendance at the annual shareholders meeting, all directors generally attend the annual meeting and all directors attended the 2016 annual shareholders meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR QUALIFICATIONS AND NOMINATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon believes that effective development and execution of Exelons strategic direction requires a board of directors that includes individuals who bring diverse experiences, skills, backgrounds, viewpoints and perspectives in order to represent effectively the long-term interests of the public and our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors seeks to maintain an appropriate balance of diversity, skills and tenure on the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fresh perspectives and new ideas are essential to maintain a nimble and strategic board, while long-serving directors can bring important experience to board deliberations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee serves as the nominating committee and recommends director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors receives the proposed nominations from the corporate governance committee and approves the nominees to be included in the Exelon proxy materials that are distributed to shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board believes that diversity among directors is an important consideration in selecting candidates for nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When considering candidates, the corporate governance committee and the full board take into account each candidates race, ethnicity, gender, age, cultural background, professional experience and other attributes relevant to our business and strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the full board determine the appropriate mix of skills and characteristics required to best fill the needs of the board and periodically review and update the criteria as deemed necessary in light of Exelons strategic direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All candidates are considered in light of the following standards and qualifications for director that are contained in the Exelon Corporate Governance Principles:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highest personal and professional ethics, integrity and values;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An inquiring and independent mind;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Practical wisdom and mature judgment;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broad training and experience at the policy-making level in business, government, education or technology;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expertise useful to Exelon and complementary to the background and experience of other Exelon board members
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Willingness to devote the required amount of time to the duties and responsibilities of board membership;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A commitment to serve over a period of years to develop knowledge about Exelon; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Involvement only in activities or interests that do not create a conflict with responsibilities to Exelon and it shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The satisfaction of these criteria is assessed by the corporate governance committee and the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees for director meet the standards listed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, all of the nominees demonstrate an appreciation for diversity and multiple cultures among directors and a commitment to sustainability and social issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement  1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the board of directors regularly consider the companys strategy and the particular skills, experiences and other qualifications that should be represented on the board as a whole in order to achieve Exelons strategic direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Listed below are summaries of specific qualifications that the corporate governance committee and the board believe must be represented on the board among other qualifications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial, accounting and financial reporting experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon uses a wide range of financial metrics to measure its operating performance and strategic opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accurate and transparent financial reporting, measurement of operating performance, and assessment of the financial merits of strategic opportunities are critical to the companys success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Senior management leadership / CEO experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon believes that directors who have significant senior leadership experience as a CEO, senior executive or board hair are better able to recognize and develop leadership skills in others and are more likely to have a practical nderstanding of organizations and drivers of individual growth and development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Knowledge of Exelons business / industry experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon engages in a complex business with significant public policy and public safety implications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The development and execution of effective strategy at Exelon depends on directors who have experience with issues of public policy and economics, energy markets, technology, nuclear power, renewable energy, and electric and gas transmission and distribution infrastructure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the largest operator of nuclear power plants in the country and one of the largest in the world, it is important that the Exelon board include individuals with experience in the operation and oversight of nuclear power facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Innovation and technology experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The industry in which Exelon conducts its business is changing rapidly with the development of new technologies, changing energy policy and environmental regulation, rapid changes in energy markets, and physical and cyber threats against the security of assets and systems.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon recognizes the importance of representation on the board o directors by individuals who possess experience in these areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Government and regulatory experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon is engaged in a business subject to extensive regulation by multiple state and federal regulatory authorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience with and understanding of government regulation is critical to Exelons ability to help shape public policy and government regulation that has a direct effect on Exelons business and strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk oversight / risk management experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons business is subject to a number of highly varied risks that could have a significant effect on public safety and shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An understanding of the most significant risks facing Exelon is a critical skill that must be represented on the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Investor relations / investment management experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon must assure strong alignment with its investors in setting strategy and direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this reason, the Exelon board of directors must include individuals who have an understanding of investments and the investment decision- making process in order to focus management and the board on significant value drivers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2  Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Manufacturing, construction, engineering and performance management experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon invests billions of dollars each year on maintenance and growth investments to improve reliability of Exelons electric and gas transmission and distribution systems and enhance customer service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon also invests substantial sums each year for maintenance of complex machinery in the generation portfolio and in development and construction of generation assets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Experience with these complex processes is important for the board of directors to provide appropriate decision-making and oversight related to complex capital projects and large and complex organizations and systems.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR NOMINEES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the recommendation of the corporate governance committee, the board nominated the 13 candidates named below or election as directors, each to serve a term ending with the annual meeting in 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees has agreed o be named in this proxy statement and to serve as a director, if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any director is unable to stand for election, the board may reduce the number of directors or designate a substitute.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, shares represented by proxies may be voted for a substitute director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon does not expect that any director nominee will be unable to serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the board believe the skills and experiences listed above are adequately represented among the nominees for director and that the nominees have a wide diversity of experiences that fill the needs of the board and its committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, ten nominees are current or former CEOs of corporations and three others have senior executive leadership experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Two directors have extensive nuclear experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Six directors have experience in banking and investment management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ten directors have experience with corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Two have served in government or government regulation and one has flag officer military experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual directors have experience or expertise in accounting, auditing, information technology, innovation, utility regulation and operations, and environmental matters, law, the economics of energy, and government affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Included in each director nominees biographical information is a listing of the key qualifications, skills and experience of each nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each nominee has other qualifications, skills and experiences that are not specifically listed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee believes that the nominees for director represent an effective mix of directors in terms of the range of backgrounds and experience and diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominees consist of directors who range in age from 51 to 72, with an average age of 63 and a median age of 62.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tenure of the nominees as directors is similarly varied, with one director having served since the companys creation in 2000, one since 2002, two since 2007, one since 2009, five since 2012, one since 2013, one since 2015, and one since 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four directors come from the Chicago area and one each come from the Philadelphia, Baltimore, and Washington, D.C. areas, while six come from other parts of the country including major metropolitan areas such as New York.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Joskow has been the President and CEO of the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation since January 1, 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Sloan Foundation is a philanthropic institution that supports research and education in science, technology and economic performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Joskow will retire as President of The Sloan Foundation at the end of 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also the Elizabeth and James Killian Professor of Economics and Management Emeritus at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Joskow joined the MIT faculty in 1972 and served as head of the MIT Department of Economics (1994-1998) and Director of the MIT Center for Energy and Environmental Policy Research (1999-2007).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At MIT he was engaged in teaching and research in the areas of industrial organization, energy and environmental economics, competition policy, and government regulation of industry for over 35 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Much of his research and consulting activity has focused on the electric power industry, electricity pricing, fuel supply, demand, generating technology, and regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Joskow intends to return to MIT following his retirement from The Sloan Foundation at the end of 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, the Econometric Society and a Distinguished Fellow of the American Economic Association.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has served on the U.S. Environmental Protection Agencys (EPA) Acid Rain Advisory Committee, on the Environmental Economics Committee of EPAs Science Advisory Board, and on the National Commission on Energy Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as the Chair of the National Academies Board on Science, Technology and Economic Policy through April 1, 2015 and on the Secretary of Energy Advisory Board until October 1, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a Trustee of the Putnam Mutual Funds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to his teaching, research, publishing and consulting activities, he has experience in the energy business, serving as a director of New England Electric System, a public utility holding company (1987-2000), until it was acquired by National Grid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He then served as a director of National Grid plc, an international electric and gas utility holding company, and one of the largest investor-owned utilities in the world (2000-2007).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Joskow served as a director of TransCanada Corporation from 2004 until March 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TransCanada is an energy infrastructure company with gas pipelines, oil pipelines, electric power operations, and natural gas storage facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served on the audit and governance committees of TransCanada.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He previously served on the audit committee of National Grid (2000-2005) and was chair of its finance committee until 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also served on the audit committee of New England Electric System and as the chair of the audit committee of the Putnam Mutual Funds (2002-2005).

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Exelons Corporate Governance Principles, a substantial majority of the board must be composed of independent directors, as defined by the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to complying with the NYSE rules, Exelon monitors the independence of audit and compensation and leadership development committee members under rules of the SEC (for members of the audit committee and compensation and leadership development committee) and the Internal Revenue Service (for members of the compensation and leadership development committee).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board has adopted independence criteria corresponding to the NYSE rules for director independence and the following categorical standards to address those relationships that are not specifically covered by the NYSE rules:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. A directors relationship with another company with which Exelon does business will not be considered a material relationship that would impair the directors independence if the aggregate of payments made by Exelon to that other company, or received by Exelon from that other company, in the most recent fiscal year, is less than the greater of $1 million or 5% of the recipients consolidated gross revenues in that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making this determination, a commercial transaction will not be deemed to affect a directors independence, if and to the extent that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the transaction involves rates or charges that are determined by competitive bidding, set with reference to prevailing market prices set by a well-established commodity market, or fixed in conformity with law or governmental authority; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the provider of goods or services in the transaction is determined by the purchaser to be the only practical source for the purchaser to obtain the goods or services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. If a director is a current employee, or a directors immediate family member is an executive officer, of a charitable or other tax-exempt organization to which Exelon has made contributions, the contributions will not be considered a material relationship that would impair the directors independence if the aggregate of contributions made by Exelon to that organization in its most recent fiscal year is less than the greater of $1 million or 2% of that organizations consolidated gross receipts in that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In any other circumstance, a directors relationship with a charity or other tax-exempt organization to which Exelon makes contributions will not be considered a material relationship that would impair the directors independence if the aggregate of all contributions made by Exelon to that organization in its most recent fiscal year is less than the greater of $1 million or 5% of that organizations consolidated gross receipts in that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions and relationships with charitable and other tax-exempt organizations that exceed these standards will be evaluated by the board to determine whether there is any effect on a directors independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each year, directors are requested to provide information about their business relationships with Exelon, including other boards on which they may serve, and their charitable, civic, cultural and professional affiliations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also gather information on significant relationships between their immediate family members and Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All relationships are evaluated by Exelons Office of Corporate Governance for materiality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Data on transactions between Exelon and companies for which an Exelon director or an immediate family member serves as a director or executive officer are presented to the corporate governance committee, which reviews the data and makes recommendations to the full board regarding the materiality of such relationships for the purpose of assessing director independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee considers other factors that may be relevant to director independence, such as tenure and personal relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The same information is considered by the full board in making the final determination of independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Crane is not considered an independent director because of his employment as president and chief executive officer of Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the other current Exelon directors was determined by our board of directors to be independent under applicable guidelines presented above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amounts involved in the transactions between Exelon and its subsidiaries, on the one hand, and the companies with which a director or an immediate family member is associated, on the other hand, all fell below the thresholds specified by the NYSE rules and the categorical standards specified in the companys Corporate Governance Principles.

sentences.text: RELATED PERSON TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon has a written policy for the review and approval or the ratification of related person transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions covered by the policy include commercial transactions for goods and services and the purchase of electricity or gas at non-tariffed rates from Exelon or any of its subsidiaries by an entity affiliated with a director or officer of Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The retail purchase of electricity or gas from ACE, BGE, ComEd, DPL, PECO or Pepco at rates set by tariff, and transactions between or among Exelon or its subsidiaries are not considered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Charitable contributions approved in accordance with Exelons Charitable Contribution Guidelines are deemed approved or ratified under the Related Persons Transaction policy and do not require separate consideration and ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required by the policy, the board reviewed all commercial, charitable, civic and other relationships with Exelon in 2016 that were disclosed by directors and executive officers of Exelon, ACE, BGE, ComEd, DPL, PECO and Pepco, and by executive officers of Exelon Generation that required separate consideration and ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Office of Corporate Governance collected information about each of these transactions, including the related persons and entities involved and the dollar amounts either paid by or received by Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Office of Corporate Governance also conducted additional due diligence, where required to determine the specific circumstances of the particular transaction, including whether it was competitively bid or whether the consideration paid was based on tariffed rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the board reviewed the analysis prepared by the Office of Corporate Governance, which identified those related person transactions which required ratification or approval, under the terms of the policy, or disclosure under the SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the board considered the facts and circumstances of each of these related person transactions, including the amounts involved, the nature of the directors or officers relationship with the other party to the transaction, whether the transaction was competitively bid and whether the price was fixed or determined by a tariffed rate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee recommended that the board ratify all of the transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the basis of the committees recommendation, the board did so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several transactions were ratified because the related person served only as a director of the affiliated company, was not an officer or employee of the affiliated company and did not have a pecuniary or material nterest in the transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For some of these transactions, the value or cost of the transaction was very small, and the board considered the de minimis nature of the transaction as further reason for ratifying it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board approved and ratified other transactions that were the result of a competitive bidding process, and therefore were considered fairly priced, or arms-length, regardless of any relationship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The remaining transactions were approved by the board, even though the director is an executive officer of the affiliated company, because the transactions involved only retail electricity or gas purchases under tariffed rates or the price and terms were determined as a result of a competitive bidding process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only one of the related person transactions is required to be disclosed in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Huntington Bank is a lender to Exelon and its subsidiaries and participates in their credit facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Huntington participates in the credit facilities on the same basis as other participating banks with terms based on a competitive process with a syndicate of banks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, Exelon and its subsidiaries paid Huntington Bank approximately $300,000 in fees for credit facilities and letters of credit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Steinour, an Exelon director, is also Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Huntington Bancshares, the parent of Huntington Bank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee and the Exelon board reviewed Huntington Banks participation in the credit facilities as related person transactions and concluded that the transactions were in the best interests of Exelon because Huntington participates in the credit facilities on terms equivalent to those of an unrelated bank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no indication that Mr. Steinour was involved in the negotiations of the credit facilities or had any direct or indirect material interest in the transactions or influence over them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As compared to Exelons and Huntingtons overall revenues, the transactions are immaterial, individually and in the aggregate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Principles, together with the board committee charters, provide the framework for the effective governance of Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors has adopted our Corporate Governance Principles to address matters including qualifications for directors, standards of independence for directors, election of directors, responsibilities and expectations of directors, and evaluating board, committee and individual director performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Principles also address director orientation and training, the evaluation of the chief executive officer and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Principles are revised from time to time to reflect emerging governance trends and to better address the particular needs of the company as they change over time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARDS FUNCTION AND STRUCTURE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons business, property and affairs are managed under the direction of the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board is elected by shareholders to oversee management of the company in the long-term interest of all shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors stand for election annually and in uncontested elections must be elected by a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board considers the interests of other constituencies, which include customers, employees, annuitants, suppliers, the communities we serve, and the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board is committed to ensuring that Exelon conducts business in accordance with the highest standards of ethics, integrity, and transparency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD LEADERSHIP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons Corporate Governance Principles grant the board of directors discretion to separate the roles of chairman and chief executive officer if the board determines that such a separation is in the best interests of Exelon and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the completion of the merger between Exelon and Constellation Energy Group in 2012, the board of directors separated the positions of chairman of the board and chief executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, Mayo A. Shattuck III serves as the independent chairman of the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Christopher M. Crane serves as president and chief executive officer of Exelon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As specified in the Corporate Governance Principles, in the event the chairman of the board cannot fulfill his duties, the chair of the corporate governance committee would serve as the acting chairman of the board until such time as a chairman of the board is selected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons Corporate Governance Principles establish the position of Lead Director when (1) the positions of chairman of the board and the chief executive officer are held by the same person, or (2) for other reasons the person holding the position of chairman of the board is not an independent director under the applicable director independence standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons chairman of the board is currently an independent director, so the board has not appointed a Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the absence of appointment of a Lead Director when a Lead Director is required, the Corporate Governance Principles call for the chair of the corporate governance committee to serve as the Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons Corporate Governance Principles specify in detail the responsibilities of the Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 22  Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board believes that Exelon has in place effective arrangements and structures to ensure that the company maintains the highest standard of corporate governance and board independence and independent board leadership and continued accountability of the chairman and the CEO to the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These arrangements and structures include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12 of the 13 nominees are independent and meet the independence requirements under the NYSE listing standards and the additional independence requirements under the companys Corporate Governance Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit, compensation and leadership development, and corporate governance committees are composed solely of and chaired by independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The finance and risk, investment oversight, and generation oversight committees are chaired by independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of the business of the Exelon board is reviewed or approved by the boards committees, and the agendas of the boards committees are driven by the independent chairs through their discussions with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board agendas, in turn, are determined in large part by the committee agendas, and discussions at board meetings are driven to a significant degree by the committee agendas and the reports the committee chairs present to the full board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance and compensation of the CEO is reviewed annually by the full board in executive session under the leadership of the corporate governance and compensation and leadership development committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR RETIREMENT POLICY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons director retirement policy provides that independent directors must retire at the end of the calendar year in which he or she reaches the age of 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, independent directors are required to submit to the board of directors a letter offering to resign if his or her principal occupation or business association changes substantially during his or her tenure as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The corporate governance committee will review and recommend to the board the action, if any, to be taken with respect to the offer of resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD OVERSIGHT OF RISK
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company operates in a market and regulatory environment that involves significant risks, many of which are beyond its direct control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company has an enterprise risk management (ERM) group consisting of a Chief Enterprise Risk Officer, a Chief Commercial Risk Officer, a Chief Credit Officer, a Vice President of ERM Operations, a Vice President of ERM Analytics and a full-time staff of 124.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risk management group draws upon other company personnel for additional support on various matters related to the identification, assessment, management, mitigation and monitoring, through established key risk indicators, of enterprise risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company also has a Risk Management Committee comprising select senior officers of the company who meet regularly to discuss matters related to enterprise risk management generally and particular risks associated with new developments or proposed transactions under consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Enterprise Risk Officer and the Risk Management Committee regularly meet with management o the company to identify and evaluate the most significant risks of the businesses and appropriate steps to manage and mitigate those risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Chief Enterprise Risk Officer and the risk management group perform a regular assessment of enterprise risks, drawing upon resources throughout the company for an assessment of the probability and severity of the identified risks as well as the control effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These risk assessments, which also include the review of operating company-specific key risk indicators, are discussed at operating company Risk Management Committees before being aggregated and reported and discussed with the boards finance and risk committee as well as the audit committee and, when appropriate, the BGE, ComEd, PECO and PHI boards of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Exelon boards generation oversight committee evaluates risks related to the companys generation business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committees of the Exelon board regularly report to the full board on the committees discussions of enterprise risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, the Exelon board regularly discusses enterprise risks in connection with consideration of emerging trends or developments and in connection with the evaluation of capital investments and other business opportunities and business strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement  23
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD/COMMITTEE/DIRECTOR EVALUATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board has an annual evaluation process that is coordinated by the chair of the corporate governance committee: committee self-evaluations; a full board evaluation; and the evaluation of the individual directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee self- evaluations consider whether and how well each committee has performed the responsibilities in its charter, whether the committee members possess the right skills and experience to perform their responsibilities or whether additional education or training is required, whether there are sufficient meetings covering the right topics, whether the meeting materials are effective, and other matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full board evaluation considers the following factors, among others, in light of the committee self-assessments: (1) the effectiveness of the board organization and committee structure; (2) the quality of meetings, agendas, presentations and meeting materials; (3) the effectiveness of director preparation and participation in discussions; (4) the effectiveness of director selection, orientation and continuing education processes; (5) the effectiveness of the process for establishing the CEOs performance criteria and evaluating his performance; and (6) the quality of administrative planning and logistical support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual director performance assessments are conducted informally as needed and involve a discussion among the chairman and other directors, including members of the corporate governance committee, using the performance expectations for directors contained in the Corporate Governance Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the chair of the corporate governance committee or the chairman of the board provides individual feedback, as necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR EDUCATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board has an orientation and onboarding program for new directors and provides continuing education for all directors that is overseen by the corporate governance committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The orientation program is tailored to the needs of each new director depending on his or her level of experience serving on other boards and knowledge of the company or industry acquired before joining the board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New directors receive materials about Exelon, the board and board policies and operations and attend meetings with the CEO and executive vice presidents and members of their staff for briefings on the executives responsibilities, programs and challenges.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New directors are also invited for tours of various company facilities, depending on their orientation needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incumbent directors are also invited to participate in site visits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continuing director education is provided during portions of regular board and committee meetings and focuses on the topics necessary to enable the board to consider effectively issues before them at that time (such as new regulatory or accounting standards).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The education often takes the form of white papers, covering timely subjects or topics, which a director can review before the meeting and ask questions about during the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee devotes a meeting each year to educating the committee members about new accounting rules and standards, and topics that are necessary to having a good understanding of our accounting practices and financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The generation oversight committee uses site visits as a regular part of education for its members; the committee holds each meeting at a different generating station (nuclear, fossil or hydro) and the agenda always includes a briefing by local plant management, a tour of the facility and lunch with plant personnel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continuing director education also involves individual directors attendance at director education seminars and programs sponsored by other organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company pays the cost for any director to attend outside director education seminars on topics relevant to their service as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INFORMATION ABOUT THE BOARD COMMITTEES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining the membership of the committees, the corporate governance committee has sought to have each committee reflect a range of backgrounds and experience and diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every member of the audit committee qualifies as an audit committee financial expert, as defined by SEC rules, and most of the members serve or have served on audit committees of other companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairs of the corporate governance and compensation and leadership development committees sit on each others committees, which is helpful in the companys process for evaluating the performance and setting the compensation of the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several members of the corporate governance committee serve or have served on the corporate governance committees of other corporations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several of the members of the compensation and leadership development committee have served on the compensation committees of other corporations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The investment oversight committee includes members with experience in investment banking and the economics of energy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective February 1, 2016, the finance and risk committee includes all members of the board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The finance and risk committee, therefore, includes members with experience in the economics of energy, nuclear operations, and banking and investment management, reflecting experience in dealing with the range of risks that the company faces.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, six standing committees assisted the board in carrying out its duties: the audit committee, the compensation and leadership development committee, the corporate governance committee, the finance and risk committee, the generation oversight committee and the investment oversight committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairman and the CEO are invited guests and are welcome to attend all committee meetings, except for the CEO when the independent directors meet in executive session.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committees, their membership during 2016 and current memberships, changes in committee assignments in 2016, and their principal responsibilities are described below:

sentences.text: AUDIT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Report of the Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committees primary responsibility is to assist the board of directors in fulfilling its responsibility to oversee and review the quality and integrity of the companys financial statements and internal controls over financial reporting, the independent auditors qualifications and independence, and the performance of the companys internal audit function and of its independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee is comprised entirely of independent directors and is governed by a board-approved, written charter stating its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter is reviewed annually and updated, as appropriate, to address changes in regulatory requirements, authoritative guidance, evolving oversight practices and investor feedback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee charter was last amended on January 31, 2017, and is available on the Exelon website at www.exeloncorp.com on the Governance page under the Investors tab, and is available in print to any shareholder who requests a copy from Exelons corporate secretary as described on page 89 of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee satisfies the independence, financial experience and other qualification requirements of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and applicable securities laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board of directors has determined that each of the members of the audit committee is an audit committee financial expert for purposes of the SECs rules and also that each of the members of the audit committee is independent as defined by the rules of the NYSE and Exelons Corporate Governance Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under its charter, the audit committees principal duties include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having sole authority to appoint, retain, or replace the independent auditor, subject to shareholder ratification, and to oversee the independence, compensation and performance of the independent auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewing financial reporting and accounting policies and practices;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overseeing the work of the internal auditor and reviewing internal controls;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the advice and assistance of the finance and risk committee, reviewing in a general manner the processes by which Exelon assesses and manages enterprise risk; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewing policies and procedures with respect to internal audits of officers and directors expenses, compliance with Exelons Code of Business Conduct, and the receipt and response to complaints regarding accounting, internal controls or auditing matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the audit committee also serves on the finance and risk committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On occasion, the audit and finance and risk committees have met jointly to review areas of mutual interest between the two committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee meets outside the presence of management for portions of its meetings to hold separate discussions with the independent auditor, the internal auditors, and the chief legal officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee met seven times in 2016, fulfilling its duties and responsibilities as outlined in its charter, as well as receiving periodic updates on the companys financial performance and strategic initiatives, as well as other matters germane to its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has primary responsibility for preparing the companys financial statements and establishing effective internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), the companys independent auditor, is responsible for auditing those financial statements and expressing an opinion on the conformity of the companys audited financial statements with generally accepted accounting principles and on the effectiveness of the companys internal controls over financial reporting based on criteria established in 2013 by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 26  Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this context, the audit committee has reviewed and discussed with management and PwC the companys audited financial statements contained in the 2016 Annual Report on SEC Form 10-K, including the critical accounting policies applied by the company in the preparation of these financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee discussed with PwC the requirements of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB), and had the opportunity to ask PwC questions relating to such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These discussions included the quality, and not just the acceptability, of the accounting principles utilized, the reasonableness of significant accounting judgments, and the clarity of disclosures in the financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each of its meetings in 2016, the audit committee met with the companys chief financial officer and other senior members of the companys financial management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee reviewed with PwC and the companys internal auditor the overall scope and plans for their respective audits in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee also received regular updates from the companys internal auditor on internal controls and business risks and from the companys general counsel on compliance and ethics issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee met with the internal auditor and PwC, with and without management present, to discuss their evaluations of the companys internal controls and the overall quality of the companys financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee also met with the companys general counsel and deputy general counsel, with and without management present, to review and discuss compliance and ethics matters, including compliance with the companys Code of Business Conduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On an ongoing basis, the audit committee considers the independence, qualifications, compensation and performance of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such consideration includes reviewing the written disclosures and the letter provided by PwC in accordance with applicable requirements of the PCAOB regarding PwCs communications with the audit committee concerning independence, and discussing with PwC their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee is responsible for the approval of audit fees, and the committee reviewed and pre-approved all fees paid to PwC in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee has adopted a policy for pre-approval of services to be performed by the independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further information on this policy and on the fees paid to PwC in 2016 and 2015 can be found in the section of this proxy statement titled Ratification of PriceWaterhouseCoopers LLP as Exelons Independent Auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee periodically reviews the level of fees approved for payment to PwC and the pre-approved non-audit services PwC has provided to the company to ensure their compatibility with independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee also monitors the companys hiring of former employees of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee monitors the performance of PwCs lead partner responsible for the audit, oversees the required rotation of PwCs lead audit partner and, through the audit committee chair, reviews and approves the selection of the lead audit partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, to help ensure auditor independence, the audit committee periodically considers whether there should be a rotation of the independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwC has served as the companys independent auditor since the companys formation in 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As in prior years, the audit committee and management have engaged in a review of PwC in connection with the audit committees consideration of whether to recommend that shareholders ratify the selection of PwC as the companys independent auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that review, the audit committee considered both the continued independence of PwC and whether retaining PwC is in the best interests of the company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to independence, other factors considered by the audit committee included:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs historical and recent overall performance on the audit, including the quality of the audit committees ongoing discussions with PwC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs expertise and capability in handling the accounting, internal control, process and system risks and practices present in the companys utility and energy generation businesses, including relative to the corresponding expertise and capabilities of other audit firms; the quality, quantity and geographic location of PwC staff, and PwCs ability to provide responsive service;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement  27
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PwCs tenure as the companys independent auditor and its familiarity with the companys operations and businesses, accounting policies and practices and internal control over financial reporting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the significant time commitment required to onboard and educate a new audit firm that could distract managements focus on financial reporting and internal control;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the appropriateness of PwCs fees, relative to the companys financial statement risk and the size and complexity of its business and related internal control environment, and compared to fees incurred by peer companies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: an assessment of PwCs identification of its known significant legal risks and proceedings that may impair PwCs ability to perform the audit; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: external information on audit quality and performance, including recent PCAOB reports on PwC and its peer firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee has concluded that PwC is independent from the company and its management, and has retained PwC as the companys independent auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The audit committee and the board believe that the continued retention of PwC is in the best interests of the company and its shareholders and have recommended that shareholders ratify the appointment of PwC as the companys independent auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in reliance on the reviews and discussions referred to above, the Exelon audit committee recommended to the Exelon board of directors (and the Exelon board of directors approved) that the audited financial statements be included in Exelon Corporations Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, for filing with the SEC.

sentences.text: COMPENSATION AND LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee is composed entirely of independent directors and is governed by a board-approved charter stating its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter is reviewed annually and updated, as appropriate, to address changes in regulatory requirements, authoritative guidance, evolving oversight practices and investor feedback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee charter was last amended on January 26, 2016, and is available on the Exelon website at www.exeloncorp.com on the Governance page under the Investors tab, and is available in print to any shareholder who requests a copy from Exelons corporate secretary as described on page 89 of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee met five times in 2016 and met informally or acted by unanimous written consent at other times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committees principal duties, as discussed in its charter, include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ensuring that executive compensation levels and targets are aligned with, and designed to achieve, Exelons strategic and operating objectives;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewing recommendations from management and outside consultants and approving or recommending approval of matters of executive compensation for officers of Exelon and its subsidiaries, including base salary, incentive awards, equity grants, perquisites, and other forms of compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewing and making recommendations to the board on leadership development, succession planning (other than the chief executive officer and president) and diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 28  Exelon Corporation Notice of the Annual Meeting and 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance at Exelon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers are involved in evaluation of the performance and development of initial recommendations with respect to compensation adjustments; however, the compensation and leadership development committee (and the independent directors with respect to the compensation of the CEO) makes the final determinations with respect to compensation programs and adjustments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairman and the CEO are considered invited guests and are welcome to attend the meetings of the compensation and leadership development committee, except when the committee meets in executive session to discuss, for example, the CEOs compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chairman and the CEO cannot call meetings of the compensation and leadership development committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management, including the executive officers, makes recommendations as to goals for the incentive compensation programs that are aligned with Exelons business plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee reviews the recommendations and establishes the final goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee strives to ensure that the goals are consistent with the overall strategic goals set by the board of directors (including the individual goals of subsidiaries, as appropriate), that they are sufficiently difficult to meaningfully incent management performance, and, if the targets are met, that the payouts will be consistent with the design for the overall compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers take an active role in evaluating the performance of the executives who report to them, directly or indirectly, and in recommending the amount of compensation their subordinate executives receive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers review peer group compensation data for each of their subordinates in conjunction with their annual performance reviews to formulate a recommendation for base salary and whether to apply an individual performance multiplier to the subordinate executives incentive payouts, and if so, the amount of the multiplier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO reviews all of the recommendations of the executive officers before they are presented to the compensation and leadership development committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The human resources function provides to the compensation and leadership development committee and the independent directors data showing the history of the compensation of the CEO and data that analyzes the cost of a range of several alternatives for changes to the compensation of the CEO, but the executive officers and the CEO do not make any recommendation to the compensation and leadership development committee or the independent directors with respect to the compensation of the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee has delegated to the CEO the authority to make off-cycle equity awards to employees who are not subject to the limitations of Internal Revenue Code (Code) Section 162(m), are not executive officers for purposes of reporting under Section 16 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and are not executive vice presidents or higher officers of Exelon, provided that such authority is limited to making grants of up to 600,000 shares in the aggregate, and 20,000 shares per recipient in any year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee reviews and ratifies these grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation and leadership development committee engaged Semler Brossy Consulting Group, LLC as its consultant through October 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the summer and fall of 2016, the committee reviewed this relationship and determined to engage Meridian Compensation Partners, LLC as its consultant after conducting a request for proposal process involving seven compensation consulting firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee determined that Meridian offered a strong and responsive team and would provide reliable and cost-competitive advice through experience, research and benchmarking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reviewing the engagement in October 2016, the committee considered the following factors in determining that Meridian is an independent consultant and does not have any conflicts of interest:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian performs no other services for the company or its affiliates and received no other fees from the company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the firm has formal written policies designed to prevent conflicts of interest; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: there were no relationships of the firm and its consultants and Exelon and its officers, directors or affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its ongoing services to the compensation and leadership development committee, the compensation consultant supports the committee in executing its duties and responsibilities with respect to Exelons executive compensation programs by providing information regarding market trends and competitive compensation programs and strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In supporting the committee, the compensation consultant does the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prepares market data for each senior executive position, including evaluating Exelons compensation strategy and reviewing and confirming the peer group used to prepare the market data;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provides the committee with an independent assessment of management recommendations for changes in the compensation structure;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Works with management to ensure that the companys executive compensation programs are designed and administered consistent with the committees requirements; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provides ad hoc support to the committee, including discussing executive compensation and related corporate governance trends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exelons human resources staff and senior management use the data provided by the compensation consultant to prepare documents for use by the compensation and leadership development committee in preparing their recommendations to the full board of directors or, in the case of the CEO, the independent directors, on compensation for the senior executives In addition to its general responsibilities, the compensation consultant attends the compensation and leadership development committees meetings, if requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee, or Exelons management on behalf of the committee, may also ask the compensation consultant to perform other executive and non-executive compensation-related projects.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee has established a process for determining whether any significant additional services will be needed and whether a separate engagement for such services is necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee has a formal compensation consultant independence policy that codifies its past practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation consultant independence policy is available on the Exelon website at www.exeloncorp.com, on the Governance page under the Investors tab.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the policy is to ensure that the advisers or consultants retained by the committee are independent of the company and its management, as determined by the committee using its reasonable business judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee considers all facts and circumstances it deems relevant, such as the nature of any relationship between a compensation consultant, the compensation consultants firm, and the company and the nature of any services provided by the compensation consultants firm to the company that are unrelated to the compensation consultants work for the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the policy, a compensation consultant shall not be considered independent if the compensation consultant or the compensation consultants firm receives more than 1% of its annual gross revenues for services provided to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the policy, the compensation consultant reports directly to the chair of the compensation and leadership development committee, and the committee approves the aggregate amount of fees to be paid to the compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
